perturbation.changed_text:
8.3 Upon termination of the Agreement:
(a) CEIS shall terminate the transmission of the Content with immediate effect; and
(b) in the event that this Agreement is terminated prior to the expiry of the Term, XFN shall recover any sums paid to CEIS in advance for the unexpired Term of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Removing 'together with interest from the date those sums were paid until the date of full refund' eliminates XFN's right to receive interest on any prepaid sums for the unexpired term if the agreement is terminated early. This contradicts laws and principles related to unjust enrichment. If CEIS holds onto funds for services not provided, failing to pay interest essentially provides them with an unlawful benefit at XFN's expense. This introduces a significant legal risk, especially if substantial amounts are prepaid. Consumer protection laws often address fair compensation in case of contract termination.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Principles of unjust enrichment and potentially consumer protection laws regarding fair compensation upon contract termination.
